usedIDs - Variable in class src.UserPackage.IDValidator
A static Set of the IDs already in the system We use a HashSet because of its constant-time access (since we're only checking if an ID is contained in the set) and its unique elements

The User class implements interfaces for the UserInterface composite component, a PosterInterface to serve as an Subject, and a FollowerInterface to serve as an Observer.
